articles.description: At GTC 2024, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang has presented a new demo for the Avatar Cloud Engine (ACE) platform, powered by Inworld AI tech.
articles.content: During today's GTC 2024 keynote, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang showed a new AI NPC demo called Covert Protocol. Unlike the Kairos demo demonstrated at CES 2024, which was based on Convai technology, this o… [+2751 chars]

articles.title: Images Shows Mars Helicopter Ingenuity With Multiple Damaged Rotor Blades - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity suffered rotor blade damage during its flight on the Red Planet. Images show that multiple blades were affected.   Credit: Space.com | footage courtesy: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta

articles.title: WhatsApp update set to enhance your experience, allow you to pin multiple chats and messages - HT Tech
